article: president george w. bush carried a promise of better treatment for neglected war veterans on a tour of walter reed army medical center in washington friday , but critics questioned the timing of the visit six weeks after shoddy conditions were exposed there .
abstract: bush visits u.s. army hospital for first time since shoddy conditions exposed
